content: I'm planning to spend 2 weeks in Japan, and I'm interested in history and culture, food and drink, and cities and urban exploration. I'd like to visit Tokyo, Kyoto, and Osaka, and I'm open to suggestions for other destinations. My budget is moderate, and I'd like to try a mix of traditional Japanese cuisine and modern twists on classic dishes. As for specific experiences, I'd love to visit the Fushimi Inari shrine in Kyoto and explore the Sumida River in Tokyo. I'm flexible with my dates, but I'd prefer a relaxed pace with some free time to wander and discover new things.
